task.title: Arrangement note
task.shortdesc: Corresponds to the 351 note field in MARC.

row.entry: Do not repeat on nested members_exemplified_by â†’ HumanMadeObject.

section.title: Source data
section.codeblock: --- name: ArrangementNote sampleBibs: - 12656596 fieldSpec: - 351ab trimPunctuation: false scriptInclusion: NONE

choices.choice: If both subfields 351ab are present, join them with a whitespace character.
Else, output the string value of 351a or 351b.

stepresult.note: This example is meant to illustrate an arrangement note and does not represent a complete JSON-LD document.
